exercises.description: Lying on your back with your knees bent, gently rotate your spine as you move your knees to the side and then reverse directions and move your knees to the other side. Repeat as you move through a comfortable range of motion.
exercises.name: LOWER TRUNK ROTATIONS - LTR - WIG WAGS - KNEE ROCKS

exercises.description: When squatting, bend over at the waist, tighten your stomach muscles by drawing in your navel and keep your back straight while bending at your hips. This will protect your back from excessive loads.Your buttock should lower behind your feet as if you are going to sit on a seat. Emphasize your weight going through your heels. Also, for good knee alignment, do not let your knees pass in front of your toes and keep your knee in line with your 2nd toe (next to the big toe) as it bends.
exercises.name: SQUAT WITH HIP HINGE - HIP AND BACK DISASSOCIATION DRILL

exercises.description: While in a crawl position, lower your buttock a little towards your feet to get in a lower position as shown. Next, with a hand behind your head, rotate your body and your head to the side, then return.
exercises.name: THORACIC ROTATION - QUADRUPED

exercises.description: While seated on an exercise ball, pull back on an elastic band in both arms as you bend your elbows. Maintain erect posture the entire time.
exercises.name: BALL SEATED ROWS

exercises.description: Start by holding the bottom of a Flexbar vertically with your unaffected side and then grab it on top with your affected side. Position your wrists so that the top wrist is held in extension and bottom in wrist flexion. Next, lower your arms and turn the Flexbar horizontal and line up your wrists so that your knuckles are pointed forward. This should place a twist tension through the bar. Then, allow your affected wrist to slowly relax and extend, thereby untwisting the bar slowly for an eccentric contraction to the wrist flexors.
exercises.name: FLEXBAR - TYLER TWIST - ECCENTRIC FLEXION

exercises.description: Press your the tip of your thumb into the putty as shown.
exercises.name: PUTTY THUMB FLEXION
